name: The Vampire
description:
The Vampire is a single-player PC game.

The Vampire is a first-person horror adventure game.

The levels consist of the Vampire Mansion, Cooper's House, and several dungeons.

Defeat the vampire bride and the undead of hell summoned by the vampire.

Discover the hidden world of the Vampire Mansion after dark and explore it as you battle fearsome vampires and defeat the undead of Hell.

Your passion is still burning.

Would you like to spend a night with Cooper, a cool-headed vampire hunter who holds the secret of an ancient legend?

Defeat the vampires and escape their world.
